markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs=""
>
[Icy Apotheosis](/Feats.aspx?ID=4105) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

You are as much a creature of cold as whatever ancestry you were born to. You are immune to cold damage and gain the [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) trait. You automatically succeed on saving throws against effects that have the cold trait.
name: Icy Apotheosis
